title: Sample Network Connectivity Troubleshooting
description: Helps resolve common network connectivity issues step by step.

nodes.text: Is the device able to connect to the internet?
Is the internet connection speed satisfactory?
Check that the network cable is firmly plugged into both the device and the router/switch.
After re-seating the cable, is the device now connected?
Power cycle the router: unplug it from the wall, wait 30 seconds, then plug it back in. Wait 60 seconds for it to fully restart.
Is the device now connected after the router restart?
The connectivity issue has been resolved. The device is now connected to the internet successfully.
Basic troubleshooting has not resolved the issue. Please escalate to the network team with a description of the steps already taken.
